7 class ObjectsConditionParser {
8 
12  protected $conditionParser;
16  protected $objects;
17 
18  public function __construct(){
19  $this->conditionParser=new ConditionParser();
20  $this->objects=[];
21  }
22 
23  public function addPartObject($object,$condition,$value){
24  $this->objects[]=$object;
25  return $this->conditionParser->addPart($condition, $value);
26  }
30  public function getConditionParser() {
31  return $this->conditionParser;
32  }
33 
37  public function getObjects() {
38  return $this->objects;
39  }
40 
41  public function hasParam($value){
42  return $this->conditionParser->hasParam($value);
43  }
44 
45  public function compileParts($separator=" OR "){
46  $this->conditionParser->compileParts($separator);
47  }
48 
49  public function addObject($object){
50  $this->objects[]=$object;
51  }
52 
53  public function isFull(){
54  return $this->conditionParser->countParts()>=PendingRelationsRequest::$MAX_ROW_COUNT;
55  }
56 }
